quotes.quote: It is heartwarming to read what you do not often hear. It is touching to realize how nice and sweet you really are, without having to make a special effort--just by being you. Precisely for being you.
There is something in the very name Friend that quickens the pulse and warms the heart.
Hurrah, Heigh ho! Let the north winds blow, for love warms the heart with a tender glow.
Tears cleanse the heart, love warms the heart.
The very thought that a man and a woman are given the gift of love and a lifetime to multiply the good times as well as divide the bad, warms the heart.
When something is heartwarming and triumphant, and not corny or preachy, it's such a powerful thing.
Well, there's nothing more touching than putting a smile on a kid's face when you can.
It is very touching that you are able to create some kind of impact through a character.
There is nothing so rewarding as to make people realize that they are worthwhile in this world.
Nothing is more rewarding than to take a song, create it out of thin air and then watch it affect people.
It's rewarding to know that a song is doing more than just helping someone to have a nice day: it's actually leaving a deposit in their lives.
The most rewarding aspect of parenting is seeing my children be authentic. The most rewarding thing for me is to see them do anything that they're proud of.
It's almost heartening to think that the attachment you have can define your perception as much as any other influence.
